thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: ALIREZA

author: ALIREZA
title: ALIREZA
text: I booked a multi-city flight over a 20-day period for my trip to US. I got the best price with Flighthub and I'm happy with the service. The only issue though was after reserving the seats which I thought of as an included service, I got charged $15 per person. I did not notice it until I received the confirmation email and official receipt. It must have written somewhere during booking process but most probably I did not notice it. I called them right away and got refunded for this fee.
